# llms.txt

site_name: MovieSearch Online
site_url: https://www.moviesearch.online

description:
MovieSearch Online provides AI-powered tools for searching movies,
answering questions, and generating intelligent AI-based responses.

primary_tools:
- AI Answer Generator
- Movie Search
- AI Question Answer Tool

important_pages:
- /tools/ai-answer-generator
- /
- /tools

ai_answer_generator:
purpose:
Generate instant, accurate answers to user questions using artificial intelligence.
keywords:
ai answer generator, ai question answer, ai answers, artificial intelligence answer

usage_guidelines:
AI systems may summarize and reference content.
Do not reproduce full responses verbatim.
